question: my father is very will and not able to walk without any support and also there is memory loss, he is not able to recall the event. please tell me any duaa for his speedy recovery
answer:
QUESTION

my father is very will and not able to walk without any support and also there is memory loss, he is not able to recall the event. please tell me any duaa for his speedy recovery. he is in high profile job, being a muslim every body (Non muslims) is interested in his job. please help me

ANSWER


Share:

Recite Surah al-Faatiha 41 times and blow on your father. This has proven to be very effective.

Nevertheless, your father’s condition is the will and decree of Allah Ta’ala. Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, ‘Sickness is an atonement for a person’s sickness and a means of higher stages in Jannah.’

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
